info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:48AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN NEW LONDON AND EAST CENTRAL SUFFOLK COUNTIES THROUGH 815 AM EDT... At 747 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mystic to 9 miles south of Southampton. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New London, Groton, Southampton, Sag Harbor, Bridgehampton, Fishers Island, Mystic, Ledyard, Voluntown, East Hampton, Hither Hills State Park, Springs, North Stonington, Montauk, and Water Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
